## SessionManager.mute() method

Mute call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mute(session: Session): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | Session | Session to mute. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

Disable sender's media tracks.
